hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
SELECT convert(addressInt.Client, sql_char) + convert(addressInt.AdrType, sql_char) + addressInt.IsMain AS id, addressInt.PostIndex AS postalCode, addressInt.Place + addressInt.Settlement AS province, addressInt.Area AS district, addressInt.City AS city, addressInt.StreetKind + addressInt.Street AS street, addressInt.House AS house, addressInt.Building AS building, addressInt.Apartment AS flat, addressHomePhone.Address as homePhone, addressJobPhone.Address as workPhone, addressMobilePhone.Address as mobilePhone FROM regdoc_dbt AS regdoc, paprkind_dbt AS docInfo, client_dbt AS client INNER JOIN persn_dbt AS persn ON client.client = persn.ClientID AND client.LegalForm = 2 LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressInt ON addressInt.Client = persn.ClientID and addressInt.AdrType = :addrType and addressInt.ConType=1 LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressJobPhone ON addressJobPhone.Client = persn.ClientID and addressJobPhone.AdrType = 1 and addressJobPhone.ConType=2 and addressJobPhone.ConKind='Рабочий' LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressHomePhone ON addressHomePhone.Client = persn.ClientID and addressHomePhone.AdrType = 1 and addressHomePhone.ConType=2 and addressHomePhone.ConKind='Домашний' LEFT JOIN address_dbt as addressMobilePhone ON addressMobilePhone.Client = persn.ClientID and addressMobilePhone.AdrType = 1 and addressMobilePhone.ConType=2 and addressMobilePhone.ConKind='Мобильный' LEFT JOIN regdoc_dbt as regDocInn ON regDocInn.Client = persn.ClientID and regDocInn.RDKind = 100 LEFT JOIN clcoun_dbt as country ON country.CodeLat3 = client.szCountryNR
WHERE client.client = :personId AND regdoc.Client = :personId AND docInfo.PaperKind = regDoc.RDKind AND regdoc.IsMain = 'X' And ((Select rdkind.DocType from rdkind_dbt As rdkind where rdkind.RDKind = regdoc.RDKind) = 1)
